version_description:
1.0.2:
- Save poker games
- Daily challenges
- Menu animations
- Bugfixes and improvements

Please send your feedback to support@governorofpoker.com

- Added new designs for poker rooms
- Added menu to see hands of last round
- Bugfixes and improvements

Please send your feedback to support@governorofpoker.com

- Added several states in poker, "on fire" and "big stack bully"
- Performance improvements
- Bugfixes

Please send your feedback to support@governorofpoker.com

- Bugfixes and improvements

Please send your feedback to support@governorofpoker.com

- Added chips and tickets offers
- Improved shop upgrades
- Bugfixes and improvements

Please send your feedback to support@governorofpoker.com
Bugfixes and improvements

- Performance improvements of world scene
- Updated loadingscreens
- Bugfixes

- Added new avatars
- Added hand ranking menu in poker
- Minor text fixes
- Improved fireworks performance
- Bugfixes

- Added 5 languages:
Spanish
Russian
German
French
Portuguese

- AI improvements
- Bugfixes
Improvements and bugfixes
Bugfixes and improvements

- Spin for free tickets and chips every 4 hours
- Added the Italian language
- Bug fixes
Bugfixes and improvements

- Improved game tips and messages
- Bug fixes

New in this update: Objectives!
Win chips by playing these mini challenges! Play now and choose your objective!

Other things in this update:
- Added a new game icon
- Reduced the startup time
- Fixed issues which caused crashes
- Improved overall performance
bugfixes

New in this update: Objectives!
Win chips by playing these mini challenges! Play now and choose your objective!

Other things in this update:
- Added a new game icon
- Reduced the startup time
- Fixed issues which caused crashes
- Improved overall performance

New in this update: Objectives!
Win chips by playing these mini challenges! Play now and choose your objective!

Other things in this update:
- Added a new game icon
- Reduced the startup time
- Fixed issues which caused crashes
- Improved overall performance

- Added a level system, your current reputation has been changed into a level. Gain more reputation to increase your level!
- Improved flow for Google Play Games
- Bugfixes

- Lowered difficulty of most objectives
- Optimized memory usage
- Bugfixes

In this release we introduce a new feature: Blackjack! When you reach level 8 the Blackjack Yacht will unlock and you can play unlimited Blackjack!

We also fixed a bug where the Last Hand Result Menu was sometimes incorrect.
Bugfixes and improvements
You can now use your profile picture from facebook as your avatar! Login to facebook now and earn FREE chips!
Bugfixes and improvements

This update we introduce exciting new features when you login with Facebook:
- See your friends on the worldmap
- Use your Facebook profile picture as your avatar
- Compete with your friends in leaderboards

- Added a new Spinner
- Adjusted interface for iPhoneX
- Bugfixes

- Sped up player decisions for higher poker speeds
- Fixed an issue with poker player state label transparency
- Some more minor bug fixes

We added new ways to add friends!
- add players with a friend ID, you can find yours in your profile
- add players from your friend's friend list

Exciting new features in this update:
We added a slot machine! Look for a second yacht on the world!
What we also did in this update:
- Lowered the level requirement for Blackjack
- Improvements to the friend lists and requests
- Bugfixes
Bug fixes

- Added Auto Spin in Slots
- Updated the Blackjack betting interface
- Fixed several crashes

- Fixed issues in translations
- Fixed issues with local notifications

We are preparing something special for December, stay tuned!

- Fixed issues in translations
- Fixed issues with local notifications
We are preparing something special for December, stay tuned!

- Improved tournament payout in first region
- Adjusted HUD graphics
- Updated World Top 10 avatars
- Bugfixes
- small bugfix in calendar

- Bugfixes
- Made leaving Blackjack and Slots easier
- Fixed issue in statistics where some hands were not recognized correctly
Minor bug fixes
Fixed the rewarded videos

- Changed home bar behaviour
- Minor bugfixes
Bug fixes
- Fix for crashes on some iOS versions
- Fix for crashes on some iOS versions
Various bug fixes and performance optimizations.
